column4: Thanks.  milen8204 As KE1HA points out, crossoveroffice is an alternative that may pick up on what wine won't do.
milen8204  I mostly just use wine, it works on lots of MS apps. not all but most and seems to do all I need, so...
:-) I try real hard not to use any MS apps, but I must confess, there is one or two Ive not be able to find a Linux/Unix alternative for.
There are very few that I need as well.  I know that gamers may need MS Windows for a lot of games, but I'm not a gamer so...
